item.title: 大选加剧财政风险，罗马尼亚维持利率不变
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行在第二次会议上维持借贷成本稳定，因为决策者选择花更多时间评估年底总统和议会选举带来的财政风险。【原文：Romania’s central bank held borrowing costs steady for a second meeting as policymakers opted to take more time to assess fiscal risks stemming from presidential and parliamentary elections due by the end of the year.】

item.title: 习近平称中国愿加强与意大利的进口和商业关系
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平向意大利总统塞尔吉奥-马塔雷拉表示，中方愿更多进口意大利的优质产品，扩大两国经贸往来。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping told Italian President Sergio Mattarella that China is willing to import more of Italy’s high-quality products and expand their business ties.】

item.title: 国债将创两个月以来最佳一周
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在总统大选中获胜，在经历了动荡的五天交易后，本周国债有望创下 9 月初以来的最佳表现。【原文：Treasuries are poised for their best week since early September after a volatile five days of trading dominated by Donald Trump’s victory in the presidential election.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备连续第五周下降，表明存在干预措施
item.description: 印度外汇储备连续第五周减少，表明央行很可能一直在干预市场，以应对卢比的疲软。【原文：India’s foreign exchange pile decreased for a fifth straight week, indicating the central bank has likely been intervening in the market to battle weakness in the rupee.】

item.title: 中国人民银行发出信号：鸽派政策和充裕流动性将带来更大决心
item.description: 在推出旨在降低地方债务风险的重大财政一揽子计划之后，中国央行加强了对支持性货币政策的承诺，并承诺使用多种工具确保市场流动性充裕。【原文：China’s central bank strengthened its commitment to supportive monetary policy and pledged to use multiple tools to ensure ample liquidity in the market, following a major fiscal package designed to reduce local debt risks.】

item.title: 西班牙特大洪灾将使保险公司损失超过 38 亿美元
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）估计，上月底肆虐西班牙瓦伦西亚地区的洪灾预计将引发超过 35 亿欧元（38 亿美元）的保险总损失。【原文：The floods that devastated the Spanish region of Valencia at the end of last month are expected to trigger total insurance losses in excess of €3.5 billion ($3.8 billion), Moody’s estimates.】

item.title: 伊坎企业减半派息，增持 CVR 能源公司股份
item.description: 亿万富翁、激进投资者卡尔-伊坎（Carl Icahn）的投资基金计划增持 CVR 能源公司（CVR Energy Inc.【原文：Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn’s investment fund is cutting its dividend payout by half as it plans to boost its stake in CVR Energy Inc.】

item.title: 埃克森退出，阿根廷期待本土页岩热潮
item.description:
当美国石油巨头从瓦卡穆埃尔塔地区撤退时，阿根廷生产商正忙于扩张。【原文：

While the US oil major is retreating from the Vaca Muerta patch, Argentine producers are busy expanding.

】

item.title: 摩根大通抓住 100 亿美元商机，西兰制药获益匪浅
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的分析师预测，这家丹麦生物技术公司的实验性减肥药佩特林肽的销售峰值可达 100 亿美元，因此西兰制药公司（Zealand Pharma A/S）周五短暂夺回了今年斯托克 600 指数中表现最佳医疗保健公司的地位。【原文：Zealand Pharma A/S briefly reclaimed its position as this year’s best performer in the Stoxx 600 Health Care Index on Friday, after analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co. predicted the Danish biotech firm’s experimental weight-loss drug petrelintide could generate $10 billion in peak sales.】

item.title: 大科技公司这次抵制特朗普的欲望似乎更弱了
item.description: 针对特朗普重返白宫，科技行业是否会再次掀起#反抗#浪潮，还是特朗普主义已经成为硅谷文化的既定组成部分？但首先...【原文：In response to Trump’s return to the White House, is the tech industry going to spring again into #resistance or is Trumpism now an established part of Silicon Valley culture? But first...】

item.title: 迈克-梅奥认为特朗普放松管制将给银行带来 "范式转变
item.description: 对于以对美国最大银行发表尖锐意见而闻名的资深分析师迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）来说，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的当选对该行业来说无异于一场巨变。【原文：For Mike Mayo, the veteran analyst known for pointed opinions on the largest US banks, the election of Donald Trump is nothing short of a sea change for the industry.】

item.title: 任天堂起诉《带枪神奇宝贝》工作室索赔 65,700 美元
item.description: 任天堂公司和神奇宝贝公司在对热门游戏 Palworld 的制造商 Pocketpair Inc.【原文：Nintendo Co. and the Pokémon Co. are seeking compensation of around ¥10 million ($65,700) in a patent infringement suit against Pocketpair Inc., the maker of hit game Palworld.】

item.title: 对特朗普交易的反思已经开始
item.description: 本周，唐纳德-特朗普在大选中获胜，他将重塑经济和政治格局，而市场的焦点正是围绕着他。【原文：Markets have singularly revolved around Donald Trump’s election triumph this week and he will reshape the economic and political landscape.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜为可再生能源空头押注增加 13 亿美元收益
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选后，本周可再生能源类股大跌，这对押注清洁能源的做空者来说无疑是一大利好。【原文：This week’s selloff in renewable energy stocks following Donald Trump’s election victory has been a boon for short sellers betting against clean energy.】

item.title: 由于汽车销售不景气，JLR 旗下塔塔汽车公司利润未达预期
item.description: 捷豹路虎的印度母公司报告称，由于南亚国家整体消费低迷，汽车销售疲软，季度利润低于预期。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover’s Indian parent reported quarterly profit that missed estimates on weaker car sales amid an overall consumption slump in the south Asian nation.】

item.title: 在英国多年的悲惨遭遇之后，英镑成为特朗普风暴中的避风港
item.description: 投资者押注英镑会反弹，这与十天前英国的大额支出预算加剧了数周的抛售时的情况截然不同。【原文：Investors are betting on a rebound for the pound, a sudden u-turn from just 10 days ago when the UK’s big-spending budget exacerbated weeks of selling.】

item.title: 据说海尔将吸引淡马锡、GIC 和穆巴达拉投资印度业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国家电制造商海尔智能家居（Haier Smart Home Co.【原文：Chinese household appliance maker Haier Smart Home Co. has drawn preliminary interest from Temasek Holdings Pte and GIC Pte as prospective investors in its Indian business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 世界粮食价格指数因生产担忧创 18 个月新高
item.description: 全球食品价格在 10 月份创下 18 个月以来的最高水平，不利的天气引发了对许多商品生产的担忧，并有可能使消费者的成本在更长时间内持续走高。【原文：Global food prices hit the highest level in 18-months in October, with unfavorable weather raising production concerns for many commodities and threatening to keep consumer costs higher for longer.】

item.title: 受金属和一次性收益提振，韦丹塔公司利润超出预期
item.description: 据韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）周五发布的一份声明称，受金属收入增加和之前费用回拨的推动，该公司截至 9 月份的季度净利润达到 435 亿卢比（约合 5.16 亿美元）。【原文：Vedanta Ltd. reported a 43.5 billion rupees ($516 million) net-profit for the quarter through September, boosted by higher revenue from metals and a write-back of earlier charges, according to a Friday statement.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦称乌克兰天然气过境结束对价格影响不大
item.description: 伯恩斯坦分析师认为，俄罗斯天然气继续流经乌克兰只会对今冬欧洲燃料价格产生很小的影响。【原文：A continuation of Russian gas flows through Ukraine would only have a small impact on European fuel prices this winter, according to Bernstein analysts.】

item.title: 加密世界的胜利之旅开始了
item.description:
该行业在选举中下注 1.35 亿美元。它获得了惊人的回报。【原文：

The industry made a $135 million bet on the election. It paid off spectacularly.

】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后货币期权交易量飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选后，货币期权交易量创下历史新高，交易员们急于押注美元进一步上涨。【原文：Trading of currency options swelled to a record after Donald Trump’s victory in the US presidential election, as traders rushed to bet on further dollar gains.】

item.title: 阿斯利康在中国市场的暴跌可能难以撼动
item.description: 本周伊始，阿斯利康公司的市场估值约为 1,710 亿英镑（2,220 亿美元）。到周四收盘时，阿斯利康的市值已跌至 1,500 亿英镑多一点，这家制药公司也被壳牌公司挤下了英国市值最大公司的宝座。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc started the week with a market valuation of about £171 billion ($222 billion). By the close on Thursday it had slumped to little more than £150 billion and the drugmaker had lost its spot as the UK’s biggest company by market value to Shell Plc.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜当日美股吸引 6 月以来最大资金流入
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师称，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布取得总统大选决定性胜利的当天，周三有高达 200 亿美元的资金流入美国股票基金。【原文：A whopping $20 billion flowed into US equity funds on Wednesday, the day Donald Trump claimed a decisive victory in the presidential election, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 捷克中央银行行长敦促采取紧缩政策，紧缩预算
item.description: 捷克央行行长表示，全球利率需要高于冠状病毒大流行之前的水平，并敦促各国政府平衡预算，以帮助控制通货膨胀。【原文：The Czech central bank governor said global interest rates need to be higher than before the coronavirus pandemic and urged governments to balance their budgets to help keep inflation under control.】

item.title: 高盛晋升德国合伙人的人数为十年来最高
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. named two German nationals as partners, the most in more than a decade, as the Wall Street bank looks to capture more business in the country.】

item.title: 中国债务置换计划不足以提振市场：Street Wrap
item.description: 中国最新的债务置换计划令股票投资者感到失望，市场观察人士现在将注意力转向即将召开的政策会议，以寻找进一步的刺激线索。【原文：China’s latest debt swap plan disappointed stock investors, with market watchers now turning their focus to upcoming policy meetings for further stimulus clues.】

item.title: 特斯拉开始提供每月 999 美元起的 Cybertruck 租赁服务
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc. is now offering the option to lease its polarizing Cybertruck, with prices starting at $999 a month.】

item.title: 关于寿司的秘密录音帮助石油交易商在伦敦提起偷猎案
item.description: 英国能源贸易公司达雷国际有限公司（Dare International Ltd.）起诉了两名前交易员，称他们 "公然 "违反了雇佣条款，以便在加入该公司在迪拜的主要竞争对手之前 "尽快获得更多资金"。【原文：British energy trading firm Dare International Ltd. sued two ex-traders alleging they “flagrantly” violated their employment terms to gain “more money as soon as possible” before joining the company’s main rival in Dubai.】

item.title: 马克斯-雷德：互联网是如何被垃圾充斥的
item.description:
了解这个人工智能的泔水世界

。【原文：

Understanding this world of AI slop

】
